/blog/:blogId: GET : get blog by blog id
/blog/new: POST : create a new blog (in request body keys required for creation of new blog are 'title' and 'body')
/blog/:blogId: PUT : update blog (in request body keys required for creation of new blog are 'title' and/or 'body')
/review/new/:blogId: POST : create a new review for a Blog (in request body key required for creation of new review is 'description')
/review/:blogId: GET : get all reviews of a blog by blog id (VIRTUAL POPULATING the REVIEWS)
